snippet: Internal documents obtained by The New York Times show the business community was seeking an active role in writing new regulations.
abstract: Internal documents obtained by The New York Times show that long before trade negotiations begin with United States in summer 2013, European business community was seeking an active role in writing new regulations over how to structure free-trade pact.
lead_paragraph: Internal documents obtained by The New York Times show the business community was seeking an active role in writing new regulations.

headline.main: European Officials Consulted Business Leaders on Trade Pact
headline.print_headline: European Officials Consulted Business Leaders on Trade Pact
